topic: Radiance Workshop Registration Page Up and running...
body:
hi,


The registration page for the Second [annual?] Radiance workshop is up,
http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/workshop/2003_Radiance_Workshop_registrationform.html.


The main workshop page has also been updated.
http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/workshop/




thanks.


judy
